  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_91154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91154</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La rotation de la Terre et le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">Earth's rotation and the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung und die Sonne der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rotação e o sol da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotazione ed il sole della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη περιστροφή και ο ήλιος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rotación y el sol de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve qu'à ce moment particulier, la longueur de la journée et celle de la nuit sont les mêmes.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that at this particular time, the length of daytime and night time are the same.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le journée</string>
            <string language="en">day time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la rotation de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth's rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la nuit</string>
            <string language="en">night time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pôle du nord</string>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pôle sud</string>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß zu dieser bestimmten 
Zeit, die Länge der Tageszeit und die Nachtzeit dieselben sind-.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que neste tempo particular, o
comprimento do dia e o tempo da noite estão o mesmo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che a questo tempo 
particolare, la lunghezza del giorno ed il tempo di notte sono la 
stessa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι σε αυτόν τον ιδιαίτερο
χρόνο, το μήκος της ημέρας και ο χρόνος νύχτας είναι οι ίδιοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que en este tiempo 
determinado, la longitud del día y el tiempo de la noche están 
igual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tageszeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachtzeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo do dia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rotação da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo da noite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólo norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólo sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo di giorno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotazione della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo di notte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρόνος ημέρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρόνος νύχτας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βόρειος πόλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νότιος πόλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiempo del día</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rotación de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tiempo de la noche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Polo Norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">poste del sur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
          </keyword>
